heroDescriptionh: We provide integrated engineering solutions that combine engineering creativity, scientific precision, and technological innovation to transform your vision into tangible reality. We strive to build a world where your dreams are embodied with the highest standards of engineering quality.
qualityCommitment: We adhere to the highest international quality standards in all our engineering projects
aboutDescription: A leading Saudi company in the field of engineering consultancy, providing integrated solutions that combine authenticity, modernity, and advanced engineering innovation.
visionDescription: We aspire to be the leading engineering partner in providing creative and practical solutions that contribute to the development of the engineering sector locally and regionally. We believe that successful engineering integrates functional beauty, technical innovation.
leadershipDesc: We strive to make the name 'Asqf' synonymous with quality and innovation in engineering consultancy.
precisionDesc: We adhere to the highest standards of quality and precision in every stage of the project.
sustainabilityDesc: We consider environmental standards in all our projects to ensure a sustainable future.
innovationDesc: We adopt the latest technologies and materials to ensure advanced and inspiring projects.
projectDistribution: Distribution of Our Projects by Specialty
servicesDescription: We offer a comprehensive range of engineering services specifically designed to transform your vision into tangible reality
integratedDesignDesc: We provide innovative design solutions covering architectural, structural, mechanical, and electrical aspects—all aligned with the highest standards of functionality, aesthetics, and the Saudi Building Code.
buildingPermits: Efficient and Fast Building Permit Issuance
buildingPermitsDesc: We handle the entire permitting process - from preparing technical drawings to final submission - saving clients time and ensuring a smooth experience with government authorities.
constructionSupervisionDesc: Our experienced engineers provide detailed site supervision to ensure precise implementation according to approved plans, maintaining quality and schedule throughout the project.
projectsDescription: We are proud to implement distinguished projects that embody our commitment to quality and innovation in every engineering detail
displayCases: designing and executing art display cases in accordance
displayCasesDesc: We participated in the Qatar Museum project by designing and executing art display cases in accordance with the highest international standards — ensuring optimal preservation and elegant presentation of valuable artworks.
fifthPyramidDesc: Implementation of a distinguished art installation blending contemporary art and precise engineering to reflect a unique artistic vision.
heritageTransformation: We brought the immersive 'Unfolding the Embassy'
heritageTransformationDesc: Creators of visionary scenography that transport visitors to the year 2040, with precise artistic presentation and high-quality installation to create a thought-provoking experience that connects contemporary art with futuristic storytelling.
immersiveExperienceDesc: We transformed the 'Unfolding the Embassy' exhibition in the first courtyard from concept to implementation.
commaInstallationDesc: Implementation of 'The Comma' installation at MDLBEAST festival in Riyadh in just two days.
mahmoudDesc: Has extensive experience in  management of engineering projects and leads our team towards excellence and success.
haithamTitle: Head of Design and Planning Department
haithamDesc: A creative architectural engineer with extensive experience in integrated architectural and engineering design.
idrisDesc: Has extensive experience in managing complex engineering projects and ensuring their implementation according to the highest quality standards.
lujainDesc: Specializes in managing major cultural and artistic projects, with experience in managing cultural events.
footerDescription: We innovate ideas... to create a ceiling worthy of your vision. We provide integrated engineering solutions from innovative design to precise implementation.
copyright: © 2026 Asqf for Engineering Consultancy. All rights reserved.
ourEngineeringStory: Our Engineering Story from the Beginning
heroDescription: A leading Saudi company in engineering consultancy, providing integrated solutions that combine authenticity, modernity, and advanced engineering innovation
storyDescription: We started our journey with a simple idea: providing distinguished engineering consulting solutions that keep pace with Vision 2030 and contribute to its achievement.
companyEstablishment: Asqaf Engineering Consultancy was established in 2023 with a team of distinguished engineers passionate about turning ideas into tangible reality. Since then, our company has grown to become one of the leading companies in engineering consulting in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
engineeringLeadershipDesc: We strive to make the name 'Asqaf' synonymous with quality and innovation in engineering consulting.
engineeringPrecisionDesc: We adhere to the highest standards of quality and accuracy at every stage of the project.
engineeringSustainabilityDesc: We consider environmental standards in all our projects to ensure a sustainable future.
engineeringInnovationDesc: We adopt the latest technologies and materials to ensure advanced and inspiring projects.
missionDescription: Providing integrated and innovative engineering solutions that meet our clients' aspirations and exceed their expectations, while adhering to the highest standards of quality, sustainability, and social responsibility.
missionPoint1: A team of qualified engineers and experts who have comprehensive experience in implementing and managing engineering projects.
missionPoint2: Available, integrated and innovative solutions for implementation.
missionPoint3: Full commitment to technical specifications and standards for engineering projects.
valuesDescription: We believe in a set of core values that guide our work, enhance our clients' confidence, and ensure the success of our projects.
valuePoint1: Quality and Excellence We adhere to the highest quality standards in all our projects.
valuePoint2: Transparency and Commitment We believe that credibility and commitment are the foundations of success.
valuePoint3: Innovation and Sustainability We always strive for innovative solutions that achieve sustainability and efficiency.
valuePoint4: Customer Satisfaction We place our customers' needs at the forefront of our priorities.
journeyDescription: A journey of growth, success and continuous development in the world of engineering
timeline2023StartDesc: Our journey started with a team of only 2 people. The challenge was to create success stories and case studies in less than a year to join the major projects and innovations happening in the Kingdom.
timeline2023GrowthDesc: The company expanded to include 14 employees in various fields - interior design, project management, site management, finishing services, and much more.
timeline2023AchievementsDesc: Implementation of pioneering projects such as the Ceramics Exhibition, Noor Riyadh Festival, and multiple artistic projects.
timeline2024ExpansionDesc: We are working to expand the scope of projects, adopt the latest technologies, and enhance implementation quality to ensure customer satisfaction and contribute to sustainable urban renaissance.
leadershipDescription: Creative minds leading the journey of engineering success and excellence
haithamTitle: Head of Design and Planning Department
haithamDesc: A creative architect with extensive experience in integrated architectural and engineering design.
idrisDesc: Has extensive experience in managing complex engineering projects and ensuring their implementation according to the highest quality standards.
lujainDesc: Specialized in managing major cultural and artistic projects, with experience in managing cultural events.
partnersDescription: We are proud of our partnerships with leading institutions and obtaining global quality certificates
readyToStart: Ready to start your engineering project with us?
readyDescription: Discover how Asqaf's professional engineering team can turn your vision into tangible reality
heroDescription: We provide a comprehensive range of engineering services specifically designed to transform your vision into reality. Innovative solutions that combine engineering creativity, scientific precision, and technological innovation.
allServicesDescription: A comprehensive package of specialized engineering services covering all aspects of design and implementation

service4Description: We deliver unique artistic and architectural installations in collaboration with local and international artists and designers.
service5Description: High-quality finishing with premium materials according to the latest international standards.
service6Description: Design and implementation of customized art projects for exhibitions, museums, and events.

buildingLicensesDesc: We handle the entire permitting process - from preparing technical drawings to final submission.
licensesFeatures: Preparation of technical drawings required for licensing
supervisionFeatures: Project delivery according to required standards
workProcessDescription: Clear and systematic steps to ensure quality and implementation of your project to the highest standards
step1Description: We listen to your requirements and help you accurately identify your project needs.
step2Description: We develop innovative designs and a detailed work plan that fits your budget and expectations.
step3Description: We implement the project under the supervision of specialized engineers with quality control.
step4Description: We deliver the project according to agreed standards with post-delivery follow-up.
ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Project With Us?
ctaDescription: Discover how ASQF's professional team can transform your vision into reality
heroProjectsDescription: We are proud to implement distinguished projects that embody our commitment to quality and innovation in every engineering detail. Discover how we turned our clients' visions into tangible reality.
projectsGalleryDescription: Browse a collection of our most prominent projects that we are proud to implement with the highest engineering quality standards

project2Description: Implementation of a distinguished art installation that blends contemporary art with precise engineering to reflect a unique artistic vision.
project3Title: Converting a Heritage Building into an Art Space
project3Description: Rehabilitation and design of a historical building to become an art exhibition space that reflects the architect's legacy.
project4Description: We brought the immersive 'Unfolding the Embassy' exhibition at Fenaa Alawwal to life—from concept to execution—crafting a visionary scenography that transports visitors into the year 2040
project5Description: Implementation of 'The Comma' installation at MDLBEAST festival in Riyadh in just two days.
project6Title: showcasing ceramic products with both elegance and functionality
project6Description: We executed the Ceramic Exhibition from site planning to final installation, delivering a design that reflected the exhibition’s identity while showcasing ceramic products with both elegance and functionality.
